name: inspirationally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that encourages people and makes them feel full of hope: Even after all these years, she is still an inspirationally positive person. Jones brings an inspirationally caring approach to the running of a large enterprise.
More examplesFewer examplesHe played a significant part, both practically and inspirationally, in the team's success at the world championships.The new manager promised to continue the work that her predecessor had so inspirationally begun.Her friends all admired her for the inspirationally brave way she led her life.
